content.rendered:
Directed by Lakshya Raj Anand

Written by John Abraham. Lakshya Raj Anand. Sumit Batheja. Vishal Kapoor

Star Cast Rakul Preet Singh (Dr. Sabaha Qureshi). John Abraham (Arjun Shergill). Jacqueline Fernandez (Ayesha). Prakash Raj (V.K. Subramaniam). Elham Ehsas (Hamid). Akdas Hayat (Officer). Rajit Kapoor (Home Minsiter Digvijay). Kiran Kumar (K V Singh). Ratna Pathak Shah (Shanti Shergill). Jaimini Pathak (Negotiator). Amritpal Singh (Elite PSG). Habib Al Aidroos (Rehman Gul). Serena Walia (Ira (voice)). Babrak Akbari (Mustafa).Md Anan Islam . Tamara Dsouza (Juhi (as Tamara D’Souza)). Athar Siddiqui (PSG Officer).Jimmi Jaiswal . Mehroos Mir (Young Hamid). Bikram Malati (Karan singh). Jarquez McClendon (Brian Allen). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Ranjit Punia (Army officer Mehta). Roshni Singh (Tamanna). Shahnawaz Bhat (Saqlain). Birendra Yadav (Police Commissioner). Nishant Goyal (Doctor). Karan Mehta (Shahid). Vikas Tomar (Minister’s Assistant). Mukesh. Kunwar Raj Singh (Sabah Assistant). Nimisha Desai (Prime Minsiter). Asheish Nijhawan (Hussain). Dheeraj Budhori. Ranjeet Singh (RAF Officer)

Language Hindi

Producers John Abraham. Devanshu Asthana. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Himanshu Joshi. Ajay Kapoor. Yogendra Mogre. Yogiraj Shetty. Navmeet Singh. Chavi Sirohi. Vihang Suryavanshi. Dheeraj Wadhawan

Production J.A. Entertainment. Pen Studios
